channel.title: ProtoQuiz Blog
channel.description: EMS study strategies, app updates, and success stories from providers using ProtoQuiz

item.title: Generic vs. Specific: Why EMS Needs Protocol-Specific Tools
item.description: Why studying *your* local protocols matters. ProtoQuiz uses your local EMS protocols to generate quizzes and scenarios to help you study.

item.title: ProtoQuiz's First Month: From Uploads to Algorithm Quizzes
item.description: A look at ProtoQuiz's first month, the challenges faced, the progress made, and the valuable community feedback that's shaping its future.

item.title: Master Your EMS Protocols with ProtoQuiz
item.description: Juggling multiple EMS agencies? ProtoQuiz makes learning and retaining different protocols easy. Upload your PDF and start quizzing!
